short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Birthday Engager is an easy-to-use digital marketing software by automatically wishing your friends Happy Birthday!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Birthday Engager Chrome Extension is an easy-to-use digital marketing software that gives you a daily head start on social media by automatically wishing your friends and connections a Happy Birthday! You will always have a way to stay in contact with your friends.
